content: After you've completed Purple Cloud Mountain, head back to the Court of Illumination Shrine. If you haven't stopped here to get the Shrine earlier, you'll need to take out two Spear Daoists, but also note a small pond of water with a Tiger Sheriff down inside, along with a green Wisp. Defeating him should also get you a special **Tiger Tendon Belt Curio** (if not, it may randomly drop from other Tiger Sheriffs).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Court of Illumination'.
The content is as follows:
After you've completed Purple Cloud Mountain, head back to the Court of Illumination Shrine. If you haven't stopped here to get the Shrine earlier, you'll need to take out two Spear Daoists, but also note a small pond of water with a Tiger Sheriff down inside, along with a green Wisp. Defeating him should also get you a special **Tiger Tendon Belt Curio** (if not, it may randomly drop from other Tiger Sheriffs).
